title: Silk Roads linking East Asia and Mediterranean

content.question: Between 200 B.C.E. and 1450 C.E., the Silk Roads linked which of the following?

choices.label: The Indian Ocean and the Atlantic Ocean
East Asia and the Mediterranean Sea
The Pacific Ocean and the Caribbean Sea

content.answer: East Asia and the Mediterranean Sea

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
